title: Build Self-Confidence
description: Confidence signals security. Stand tall, make eye contact, smile genuinely.
education: Self-perception theory: behaving confidently increases internal confidence.

title: Active Listening
description: Ask follow-up questions and show genuine interest.
education: Reciprocity: giving attention invites attention back.

title: Positive Body Language
description: Open posture, slight lean-in, subtle mirroring.

title: Dress Authentically
description: Wear what makes you feel good and reflects you.
education: Halo effect: one positive trait influences overall perception.

title: Use Light Humor
description: Witty observations or playful teasing (when appropriate).
education: Humor reduces tension and releases endorphins.

title: Set & Respect Boundaries
description: Clear communication of comfort levels is attractive.
education: Consent and mutual respect build trust.

title: Genuine Kindness
description: Sincere compliments and helpfulness go far.
education: Prosocial behavior fosters liking and reciprocity.
